entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:32 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wet snow mixed with rain beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:32 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
